title: Comparing competitive toughness to benchmark outcomes in retail oligopoly pricing

affiliations.name: Forestry and Fisheries International Affairs Department, Ministry of Agriculture Tokyo Japan

Ryo Sakamoto is a Section Chief in the International Affairs Department at Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries in Japan. He received his master's degrees in agricultural economics from Kobe University, Japan in 2010 and University of Wisconsin-Madison in 2016. His current research interests include industrial organization in food and agricultural sectors.
